content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly identify ONE cause of the development depicted in the petition. Briefly describe ONE argument made in the petition. Briefly describe ONE similarity between the British-Native American relations described in the petition and French-Native American relations.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
